data.title: 6: GUIDE TO CATHOLIC RECORDS ABOUT NATIVE AMERICANS IN THE UNITED STATES // Archives // Raynor Library // Marquette University
data.text:
These Catholic Church agencies and affiliated Catholic organizations have had past involvement in evangelization and ministry to Native Americans in the United States, and as such, they are included in the Marquette Archives' Native Guide. These terms are Library of Congress (LC) subject headings for the groups and used in the entries. See Search and Tips for effective use of these terms.

Catholic Church. Holy See

Three agencies of the Holy See include at least some documentation pertaining to Native Americans in the United States. They are the Archivio Vaticana or Archivum Secretum Vaticanum (Vatican Archives), which is in Vatican City, and the Biblioteca Apostolica Vaticana (Vatican Library) and the Congregatio Pro Gentium Evangelizatione (Congregation for the Evangelization of Peoples), both of which are in Rome. The Congregatio Pro Gentium Evangelizatione was formerly known as the Congregatio de Propaganda Fide or Propaganda Fide.

Catholic Church. United States Conference of Catholic Bishops

Through its subcommittee on Native American Affairs, the United States Conference of Catholic Bishops connects with diocesan and national activities about Native American Catholics.

Catholic Church. Archdioceses and Dioceses

These Roman rite arch/ dioceses are arranged A-Z by state and there under by lineage. Within the repository entries, history notes are included for all Native Catholic missions, parishes, and schools within that diocese and its predecessors. For more summary information on the history of dioceses, see the website, Catholic Hierarchy.

Affiliated Catholic Organizations

The Native Guide entries note the following religious organizations. The Official Catholic Directory provides concise descriptions for many of these organizations and the Catholic Encyclopedia provided historical summaries for a few of the largest ones.

Confraternities

Catholic Chippewa Congress (Minnesota)

Catholic Sioux Congress (Montana, North Dakota, South Dakota)

Evangelistic Organizations

American Board of Catholic Missions

Bureau of Catholic Indian Missions [Black and Indian Mission Office]

Catholic Church Extension Society of the United States of America [Catholic Church Extension Society, Extension]

Catholic Interracial Council

Catholic Medical Mission Board

Commission for Catholic Missions among Colored People and Indians [Black and Indian Mission Office]

Ludwigs-verein (Germany)
